name: Riverboat Slide
description:
Riverboat Slide is a new variant on 3 card poker! Unlike conventional 3 card employs additional strategy and decision making. Players can have access to a “flop”. Make the best 3 card poker hand from any combination of your 3 cards plus the Slide card!

More decisions, more chances to bet, more ways to win!

If you’re bored with 3 card poker, Riverboat Switch has what you’re looking for.
